00021 typedef struct port {
00022   unsigned char kind;
00023   union {
00024     struct {
00025       FILE *file;
00026       int closeit;
00027     } stdio;
00028     struct {
00029       char *start;
00030       char *past_the_end;
00031       char *curr;
00032     } string;
00033   } rep;
00034 } port;

00036 /* cell structure */
00037 struct cell {
00038   unsigned int _flag;
00039   union {
00040     struct {
00041       char   *_svalue;
00042       int   _length;
00043     } _string;
00044     num _number;
00045     port *_port;
00046     foreign_func _ff;
00047     struct {
00048       struct cell *_car;
00049       struct cell *_cdr;
00050     } _cons;
00051   } _object;
00052 };
